thread.title: Coronation Street's Catherine Tyldesley confirms Eva and Aidan spark: 'I'm spoiled for choice' - Coronation Street Soaps
thread.title_full: Coronation Street's Catherine Tyldesley confirms Eva and Aidan spark: 'I'm spoiled for choice' - Coronation Street News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Coronation Street's Catherine Tyldesley confirms Eva and Aidan spark: 'I'm spoiled for choice' - Coronation Street Soaps
text: Catherine Tyldesley has confirmed there will be a romance between Eva and Aidan.The actress has just returned to Coronation Street after her maternity leave and has revealed that Eva is "spoiled for choice" when it comes to the men on the cobbles. © Getty Images "As an actress, I'd like to see Eva get back together with Jason and, as a viewer, I'd like that, too, because they just work. They're very sweet together and there are still a lot of feelings there; she still loves Jason and I think that's reciprocated," Tyldesley told the " target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Daily Star Sunday."They're kindred spirits, so I'd say, "Watch this space." But I'm spoilt for choice! After Eva finds out that Jason slept with Alya, she thinks, "Well, I love Jason more than he loves me and this Aidan guy is pretty fit"."So when Aidan interviews her for a job as a machinist at the factory, she starts flirting with him – and not just because she wants her old job back." © ITV Her temporary exit for Eva aired in February, as she decided to leave the cobbles for a while after Jason mistakenly accused her of an affair with his father Tony Stewart. Jason has since discovered that his half-brother Todd was responsible for tricking him into his suspicions.Tyldesley and her fiancé Tom Pitfield became parents for the first time when she gave birth to a baby boy Alfie in March.Digital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on Ian and Kathy's EastEnders reunion, Sally Webster's Coronation Street wedding shocker, a horror accident in Emmerdale and a fire drama for one Hollyoaks family. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4516731769001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14516731769001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4516731769001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4516731769001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14516731769001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4516731769001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Get the Inside Soap magazine on your iPhone or iPad
